title: my posts start out with 0 points?

body: I've seen another post and it's just a glitch.
body_html: I've seen another post and it's just a glitch.

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body: Yes, they said they're trying to fix issues with voting and this started happening as a side effect. It will get fixed eventually.

post.title: my posts start out with 0 points?

body: Someone mentioned that a recent fix implemented to solve an issue with voting on mobile devices has unwittingly introduced this broader ~~bug~~ feature.
body_html: Someone mentioned that a recent fix implemented to solve an issue with voting on mobile devices has unwittingly introduced this broader bug feature.
